titleStmt.title: A carrouse to the Emperor, the royal Pole, and the much-wrong'd Duke of Lorrain. To a new tune, at the play-house.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby in Pye-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Hark! I hear the cannons roar ..."
Item at A5:2[453] imperfect: trimmed affecting imprint.
